scripts.ci:launch: make tmp/ci.env && cp tmp/ci.env .env && vite --mode dev_local
scripts._build:dev: npm run -s _touchDevLocalEnv && make refresh-build && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml run --rm build
scripts.preinstall:
[ ${npm_config_omit:-_} = optional ] || ( echo >&2 "***	Please install with '--omit=optional'. We want to avoid local copies of 'vite', 'esbuild*' and 'rollup').
	This has to do with use of Docker Compose to run Vite.
"; false )
scripts.postinstall: if [ -z $BUILDER_OUTPUT ]; then npm run -s _postinstall_dev ; else npm run -s _postinstall_ci ; fi
scripts._postinstall_dev: (cd node_modules && rm -rf vite rollup esbuild esbuild-*)
